summary: This document is an email chain from July 28, 2019, regarding the status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It reports that Epstein was being taken off psychological observation and suicide watch, while also noting his complaints of physical symptoms including numbness in his right arm and neck.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who is being taken off psychological observation and suicide watch, and who complained of physical symptoms including numbness in his right arm and neck.

events.title: Epstein taken off suicide watch and psych observation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was removed from psychological observation and suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with a report stating he seemed psychologically stable but complained of physical numbness.

keyFacts: On July 28, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was reported as being taken off psychological observation and suicide watch.
The report stated Epstein 'seems psychologically stable' but complained of numbness in his right arm, neck, and an inability to make a fist.
Epstein also reported a running toilet in his cell the previous night that caused noise disturbance, with plans to move him if the issue persisted.
